name: Space Invaders (itch) (QuantumCookie)
description:
This Space Invaders clone was one of my oldest projects, back when I was in boarding school. I made this with the limited time I had at school, with zero internet access, using vanilla Java 2D. I updated the art after I left school, but the code is pretty much the same. Ah, the nostalgia. Have fun with it!

Controls

  • WASD - Movement
  • "Space" Bar - Shoot

Tips:

  1. You can change the difficulty setting in the main menu.
  2. Did you know, if you lose all health, you lose. If you run out of time, you lose. If enough enemies get past you, you lose. Inevitable, you lose.
